author: apsallid
body:
#### PR description:

Due to massive changes in the Validation package code coming from PR #36712 we have to update the scripts responsible for the RelVal campaigns. 

#### PR validation:

We have tested the PR to produce the report for the latest 12_3_0_pre5_phase2_D88 campaign. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This is not a backport. 

@rovere @pfs @felicepantaleo @lecriste @ebrondol
title: [HGCAL] Update validation scripts
